attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: Saw this app as a suggestion on Facebook and when I downloaded it, immediately after it finished downloading it shut down my phone. It took 6 hours to download, and stole my card information after I got my phone working again. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: horrible app trump is horrible and shouldn’t have an app he makes everyone’s life woes also people said it takes forever to download and I tried it and stopped halfway through because just that took like 15 minutes just bad app overall

attributes.title: barf barf👹
attributes.review: immediately after downloading the app, I contracted a rare disease😭 the disease caused my skin to sag and turn orange🍊 personally I believe that the disease infected me because I downloaded something pro trump. it was a horrible experience😩and I will never be able to truly recover. so i warn you to stay away from this app😔

attributes.title: I almost died 😭
attributes.review: I was waiting for the app to download and then I had heard a knock on the door and it was 5 of trump’s Guards and they were telling me to give it a five star review and they had put me in there car and lucky I had my phone on me so my mom and dad could pick me up I’m so traumatized now😭😭

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: This app told me that I was ugly and I don’t want to see a old crusty looking orange on my screen😳 this app is so laggy and it showed very inappropriate pictures that I did not want to see, this app took 3 hours to download and trump said I look like a book😔 trump be Wildin 🤪 this app is garbage 🗑 Charli D’Amelio even thinks the same

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and everything was fine until a picture of the giant-ass cheeto popped up on my screen. All of the sudden, my phone screen cracked down the middle and soon, it split my entire phone!! HIGHLY DON’T RECOMMEND IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR PHONE!! The power of the orange’s ugliness is too much for your phones!!!

Well, since you wanna ban Tik Tok I’m gonna ban your app. Your “supporters” 😏 signed up for your let’s continue the spread of corona rally, but couldn’t pull up because they got it before they could attend. You then decided you wanted to ban Tik Tok for no reason at all. In return I’m serving you with this one star review, 🍊.

From, your worst enemy, 
K

attributes.title: It could be worse!
attributes.review: I lied. It’s really bad. Hate it. Why is there not a one star option? My phone got a virus and I can no longer look at Cheeto puffs the same :/ y’all hyped up this app so I had to see for myself but y’all were just being nice apparently. Bring back cyber bullying.💖

attributes.title: Remove This App
attributes.review: This app took hours to download. When I opened the app I received a video of a child being raped. It was very disturbing and I don’t know why that video popped up. Racists are also very common on this app. People should not download this app it is the worst app to ever be created. And the president is a rapey misogynistic bastard.

attributes.title: Worst thing ever
attributes.review: The app made my phone glitch so bad like I had to cut my phone off then back on in order for it to work but when I cut it back on and tried to open the app again it did the same thing over again🤦🏽‍♀️fix it
